Posted on August 27, 2015

Looking back at the ‘Overview’ The OSDI API implementation is in line with CiviCRM’s mission to be an open platform for organizations of all sizes. Creating the implementation will allow them to use the OSDI API easily. The existence of a common API will reduce progressive data vendors’ customer costs... [Read More]
